q: urging Mike Pence to run for the presidency is a former deputy counsel to Ronald Reagan and former U.S. Rep. Jim Ryun , R-Kan. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite. company behind the Internet's dominant gateway. The surprise shake-up announced Thursday appears to be driven by Eric Schmidt 's desire to assume more of a behind-the-scenes role as much as Page's personal ambition. Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter account moments after Google Inc. dropped the bombshell that upstaged its fourth-quarter earnings. Eric Schmidt , 55, will still be available to advise Page, 37, and Google Inc. 's other 37-year-old founder, Sergey Brin

sitting CEOs, said Peter Schiff Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success,`` the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years.'' It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page. Both men, along with Google Inc. 's other co-founder Sergey Brin , have limited their salaries to$ 1 for

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals. confirmed that it would be proper for the attorney general to obtain the views of ministers on the national interest before reaching his own independent decision. Ministers' views would be passed to the DPP and he would then exercise independent judgment, taking on board the serious considerations that have been given to the matter by other ministers and the attorney general . All this strikes me as perfectly proper. Before authorising the arrest and detention of a visiting politician such as Henry Kissinger or Donald Rumsfeld , the DPP would take into account any views expressed by William Hague or Liam Fox

This, of course, was the mother of all intelligence failures, but Donald Rumsfeld attempts to shift the argument to higher ground, saying illegal weapons should have been only one of the many reasons for invading Iraq, including violations of U.N. resolutions and attacks on American pilots in the no-fly zone.
